name: Mustache Knight
description:
Your homeland is in perish! The Evil sorcerer has take over the casttle!

WASD to move and R to restart Stage

Duo to a bug, a information is missing! To open the Up door and the hidden one you nedd first complete the LEft and Right Wings!
